meanings.definition: The way that someone or something looks to other people
meanings.sent1: Her appearances at the party always drew attention.
meanings.sent2: The appearances of the new student were quite striking.
meanings.sent3: His appearances in different outfits made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The appearances of the mysterious figure left everyone curious.
meanings.sent5: The appearances of the colorful flowers brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: The act of coming into sight or becoming visible
meanings.sent1: The sudden appearances of fireflies in the garden amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: The appearances of stars in the night sky were breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The appearances of the magician's tricks left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The appearances of the sun after a storm brought hope to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The appearances of the rainbow after the rain delighted everyone.

meanings.definition: The outward aspect of someone or something
meanings.sent1: The appearances of the old house were quite charming.
meanings.sent2: The appearances of the actor on stage were captivating.
meanings.sent3: The appearances of the cake were deceivingly simple.
meanings.sent4: The appearances of the mountain range were majestic.
meanings.sent5: The appearances of the city skyline at night were mesmerizing.
